languages.text: {n}Вокс молчит несколько минут.{/n} "У сообщений нет никакой внятной структуры или причины. Заверения в верности, запросы об аудиенции, даже мольбы о снисхождении... одно ясно, Лорд-капитан — что-то привело высшие эшелоны знати в возбужденное состояние. Иными словами... они напуганы".

{n}The vox is silent for several minutes.{/n} "The messages have no discernible structure or cause. Professions of loyalty. Audience requests. Even pleas for leniency... One thing is clear, Lord Captain: something has agitated the upper echelons of the nobility. In other words... they are scared."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс молчит несколько минут.{/n} "У сообщений нет никакой внятной структуры или причины. Заверения в верности, запросы об аудиенции, даже мольбы о снисхождении... одно ясно, Лорд-капитан — что-то привело высшие эшелоны знати в возбужденное состояние. Иными словами... они напуганы".

One thing is clear, Lord Captain: something has agitated the upper echelons of the nobility. In other words... they are scared."

{n}The vox is silent for several minutes.{/n} "The messages have no discernible structure or cause. Professions of loyalty. Audience requests. Even pleas for leniency... One thing is clear, Lord Captain: something has agitated the upper echelons of the nobility. In other words... they are scared."

languages.text: {n}Das Vox schweigt mehrere Minuten.{/n} "Die Nachrichten haben keine eindeutigen Strukturen oder Anlässe. Loyalität wird versichert. Audienzen werden angefragt. Sogar um Nachsicht wird gebeten ... Aber eines ist klar, Lord Captain: Etwas hat die höchsten Kreise des Adels in Aufruhr versetzt. Mit anderen Worten ... sie haben Angst."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for several minutes.{/n} "The messages have no discernible structure or cause. Professions of loyalty. Audience requests. Even pleas for leniency... One thing is clear, Lord Captain: something has agitated the upper echelons of the nobility. In other words... they are scared."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox schweigt mehrere Minuten.{/n} "Die Nachrichten haben keine eindeutigen Strukturen oder Anlässe. Loyalität wird versichert. Audienzen werden angefragt. Sogar um Nachsicht wird gebeten ... Aber eines ist klar, Lord Captain: Etwas hat die höchsten Kreise des Adels in Aufruhr versetzt. Mit anderen Worten ... sie haben Angst."

languages.text: {n}Le silence règne pendant quelques minutes.{/n} « Ces messages n'ont ni queue ni tête. Des promesses de loyauté. Des demandes d'audience. Des supplications de clémence... Une chose est sûre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les hautes sphères de la noblesse sont troublées. Autrement dit... elles ont peur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for several minutes.{/n} "The messages have no discernible structure or cause. Professions of loyalty. Audience requests. Even pleas for leniency... One thing is clear, Lord Captain: something has agitated the upper echelons of the nobility. In other words... they are scared."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le silence règne pendant quelques minutes.{/n} « Ces messages n'ont ni queue ni tête. Des promesses de loyauté. Des demandes d'audience. Des supplications de clémence... Une chose est sûre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les hautes sphères de la noblesse sont troublées. Autrement dit... elles ont peur. »

languages.text: {n}音阵频道沉默了几分钟。{/n}“这些音阵信息没有任何明显的原因或要求。有的信息是在向您表忠心，有的希望能与您见面，甚至还有的是在恳求您宽大处理……有件事情很清楚，舰长大人。有什么东西扰乱了上层贵族的日常职责，换句话说……他们吓坏了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for several minutes.{/n} "The messages have no discernible structure or cause. Professions of loyalty. Audience requests. Even pleas for leniency... One thing is clear, Lord Captain: something has agitated the upper echelons of the nobility. In other words... they are scared."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵频道沉默了几分钟。{/n}“这些音阵信息没有任何明显的原因或要求。有的信息是在向您表忠心，有的希望能与您见面，甚至还有的是在恳求您宽大处理……有件事情很清楚，舰长大人。有什么东西扰乱了上层贵族的日常职责，换句话说……他们吓坏了。”

languages.text: {n}El voco guarda silencio durante unos minutos.{/n} «Los mensajes no tienen estructura ni causa identificable. Profesiones de lealtad, solicitudes de audiencia, incluso súplicas de indulgencia... Una cosa está clara, Lord Capitán: algo ha inquietado a la alta nobleza. Es decir... tienen miedo».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for several minutes.{/n} "The messages have no discernible structure or cause. Professions of loyalty. Audience requests. Even pleas for leniency... One thing is clear, Lord Captain: something has agitated the upper echelons of the nobility. In other words... they are scared."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco guarda silencio durante unos minutos.{/n} «Los mensajes no tienen estructura ni causa identificable. Profesiones de lealtad, solicitudes de audiencia, incluso súplicas de indulgencia... Una cosa está clara, Lord Capitán: algo ha inquietado a la alta nobleza. Es decir... tienen miedo».

languages.text: {n}数分間、ヴォクスは沈黙したままだった。{/n}「メッセージには明確な構造や目的が見られません。忠誠の誓い、謁見の要求、さらには寛大な処置を求める嘆願もあります…ただ一つはっきりしていることがあります、ロード・キャプテン。貴族の上層部が動揺しています。言い換えれば…彼らは恐れているのです」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for several minutes.{/n} "The messages have no discernible structure or cause. Professions of loyalty. Audience requests. Even pleas for leniency... One thing is clear, Lord Captain: something has agitated the upper echelons of the nobility. In other words... they are scared."

traits.locale_text: {n}数分間、ヴォクスは沈黙したままだった。{/n}「メッセージには明確な構造や目的が見られません。忠誠の誓い、謁見の要求、さらには寛大な処置を求める嘆願もあります…ただ一つはっきりしていることがあります、ロード・キャプテン。貴族の上層部が動揺しています。言い換えれば…彼らは恐れているのです」

languages.text: {n}Voks, bir süreliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Mesajların açık bir yapısı ya da gerekçesi yok. Bağlılık bildirileri, görüşme talepleri, hatta merhamet dilekleri... Şu kesin Lord Kaptan: Soyluların en üst tabakası ciddi biçimde huzursuz. Yani... Korkuyorlar."
languages.original_text: {n}The vox is silent for several minutes.{/n} "The messages have no discernible structure or cause. Professions of loyalty. Audience requests. Even pleas for leniency... One thing is clear, Lord Captain: something has agitated the upper echelons of the nobility. In other words... they are scared."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks bir süreliğine sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Mesajların açık bir yapısı ya da gerekçesi yok. Bağlılık bildirileri, görüşme talepleri, hatta merhamet dilekleri... Şu kesin, Lord Kaptan: Soyluların en üst tabakası ciddi biçimde huzursuz. Yani... Korkuyorlar."
